CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK(SUBSTITUTE("https://www.zillow.com/homes/" + SUBSTITUTE( Present_Address__c, " ", "%20") + ",%20" + SUBSTITUTE( Present_Address_City__c," ", "%20") + ",%20" + Present_Address_State__c + ",%20" + Present_Address_Zip__c + "_rb", " ", "%20"), "Zillow Value")
CustomField.label: Zillow Link
